translation.en: Do it, do it, do it, do it, do it!
Hey, stop right there!
Down! Now!
Getting expelled from one elite private school! Hey, it happens.
translation.ja: 優秀な私立を退学になるのは まだ分かる

translation.en: Getting expelled from two, that takes talent.
Summer, can you see why your mother's upset?
translation.ja: サマー お母様は怒ってる

translation.en: I told her months ago I didn't like it there.
translation.ja: 嫌だって何カ月も前に言った

translation.en: Pardon my French, but the kids were garbage.
As opposed to the criminals she spends time with now.
She doesn't even know them.
I know that you are the only one who got caught.
Maybe it's time you faced reality Margot,
translation.ja: 現実を見たら？　マーゴット

translation.en: school isn't the best environment for me.
Well you're in luck there because there's no decent school that's going to take you.
translation.ja: よかった 編入できる学校がない

translation.en: And to do this to me, now!
Oh did Margot tell you the good news?
Our award winning photographer over here got a gig in the Middle East.
translation.ja: 賞をもらった写真家に 中東での仕事が

translation.en: West Asia! It's more accurate to say West Asia.
translation.ja: 西アジア 正確には“西アジア”よ

translation.en: Congratulations.
Thank you. It's exciting.
translation.ja: ありがとう　楽しみよ

translation.en: I'm sure...
...and what's going to happen to Summer?
Hello.
Abbie?
Ahh, yeah.
Holy cow Abby, it's Margot.
translation.ja: よかった マーゴットよ

translation.en: Margot!?
You're still on the same number?
Yes, same number at the same house.
translation.ja: ええ 番号も家も同じ

translation.en: How are you?
Good, great, yeah I mean you know me,
translation.ja: 元気よ すごくね 相変わらず忙しいけど…

translation.en: too much on my plate but ahh...
translation.ja: 相変わらず忙しいけど…

translation.en: ...how's Thommo? It's been forever.
translation.ja: トモは？　久しぶりね

translation.en: About a decade I'd say.
No, has it really been 10 years?
What do you think you're doing?
Can't put me on a plane if I don't have any clothes.
translation.ja: 服がなきゃ飛行機に乗れない

translation.en: Seriously, do not.
Hey! Whoo!
So, you're going to think I'm crazy
translation.ja: 変に思うかもしれないけど

translation.en: but I need a huge, huge favour,
translation.ja: お願いしたいことがあるの

translation.en: and you're the first person I thought of.
You're the last person she thought of.
So anyway, what are you guys up to for the next couple of months?
Read my lips Margot.
There is no way that I'm going to live with virtual strangers,
translation.ja: 地球の裏側で ほぼ知らない人たちと

translation.en: on the other side of the freaking world.
♪ Never took your side Never cursed your name ♪
She looks extremely cool.
Anything look familiar?
I left when I was four, not a lot of memories being formed.
translation.ja: ４歳だったから あんまり覚えてない

translation.en: Summer darling, what do you need first?
Food? Shower? Sleep?
translation.ja: 食事？　シャワーか睡眠？

translation.en: I'd settle for a signal. I have zero bars.
translation.ja: 圏外なのをどうにかしたい

translation.en: You only get signal at Reception Point.
translation.ja: 受信地点に行かなきゃ

translation.en: Honey, black- shouldered kite.
translation.ja: オーストラリア カタグロトビだ！

translation.en: How do you feel about bird watching? It's surprisingly cool.
translation.ja: バードウォッチングは好き？

translation.en: So there's a big competition here this weekend, Summer.
translation.ja: 今週末に大会があるから

translation.en: That's why Ari couldn't be out at the airport to meet you.
translation.ja: アリは迎えに来てないの

translation.en: Are you into surfing?
- Uh- uh. - Yes!
translation.ja: しない やった！ みんなソレばっかりなの

translation.en: That's all anybody talks about in this town.
translation.ja: やった！ みんなソレばっかりなの

translation.en: Things are about to kick off here at the Shorehaven Pro Juniors.
translation.ja: ショアヘイブン･ プロジュニア大会の開幕です

translation.en: Over the next two days, the very best young surfers
translation.ja: ２日間の期間中 若いサーファーたちが

translation.en: on this circuit will battle it out as they start their quest
translation.ja: ２日間の期間中 若いサーファーたちが 州代表チームへの 選出を目指して戦います

translation.en: for the selection on the state team.
translation.ja: 州代表チームへの 選出を目指して戦います

translation.en: The sun's poking through and Huey has delivered clean, three foot swells.
translation.ja: 日が差して 波は頭より高くなっています

translation.en: So, it is on!
Hey, Marlon.
Sorry about your heat. Up against Ahmed.
translation.ja: 相手がアハメドとは残念だな

translation.en: He's definitely going to smoke you, but no offence.
translation.ja: きっと大負けする 君は１年も離れてた

translation.en: I mean, you've been out for a year.
I don't know. Rehab's been pretty intense. Heaps of upper body work.
translation.ja: どうかな リハビリで上半身を鍛えた

translation.en: Just, no surfing.
He doesn't know the break like I do.
translation.ja: 知識がある ブレイクは変わる

translation.en: But the break's changed, man.
The bank moved. It works at a high tide now.
translation.ja: バンクが移動した 今は満潮で当たる

translation.en: Everything's different.
But hey, good luck.
Did we bring any bags?
I put them in the boot.
Ah thanks, love.
With any luck, Ari's going to be finished by the time we get back from the shops.
translation.ja: 戻るまでに 大会が終わるかしら

translation.en: See you soon.
So, Reception Point.
translation.ja: それで 受信地点は？

translation.en: Big hill, end of the car park.
translation.ja: 丘の駐車場の端にある

translation.en: I don't know if you remember,
but I used to take you and Ari there when you were little tackers to whale watch.
translation.ja: 昔 アリと君に クジラを見せた

translation.en: We can all go together.
Yeah, that sounds great, but I'm just making some calls.
translation.ja: 少し通話するだけだから

translation.en: Back soon.
Sorry! Sorry!
Are you okay?
Maybe... ...if concussion doesn't take me in the night.
translation.ja: 夜になって脳しんとうで 死ななければね

translation.en: You're American.
Yeah, I've been consigned here, like an old timey, British convict.
translation.ja: そう 昔の囚人みたいに 流刑された

translation.en: Staying with this family I haven't seen since forever.
translation.ja: 親しくもない一家のところに

translation.en: Wouldn't be the Gibsons?
It's a small town. Everyone kind of knows everyone.
Well, from what I can tell so far,
the mum is strung tighter than a violin.
Daughter's from outer space,
and the dad reminds me of the homeless men who talk to pigeons in Central Park.
translation.ja: 父親はハトに話しかける ホームレスみたい

translation.en: Haven't met the son yet, but on the evidence,
translation.ja: 息子は会ってないけど

translation.en: he'll definitely be somewhere on the loser spectrum.
translation.ja: 聞いたところ負け犬ね

translation.en: Definitely.
Attention heat three, 15 minute warning.
That's me.
I'll see you around, Summer.
Hey, how do you know Ari?
Oh, crap.
The swell has just picked up in time for the Boys Under 16.
translation.ja: 16歳未満の男子の部 いい波が出ています

translation.en: Heat three is Casey, Phillips, Ahmed,
translation.ja: 第３ヒート出場者は ケーシー･フィリップス

translation.en: and Shorehaven's own, Ari Gibson.
translation.ja: アハメドと 地元のアリ･ギブソン

translation.en: Gibson's gills are dry after a year out with injury.
translation.ja: ケガで１年休んでいた ギブソン

translation.en: First competition back. Let's see what he brings to the party.
translation.ja: 復帰後の力を 見せてもらいましょう

translation.en: Here we go. Phillips in red, makes the first move.
translation.ja: 赤色のフィリップスの１本目

translation.en: This guy has technique to burn.
Gibson in gold, Ahmed in green, yet to post scores.
translation.ja: 黄色のギブソンと 緑色のアハメドは互角

translation.en: Gibson does well, he's in the right spot. Ahmed pounces.
translation.ja: ギブソンがいい位置に アハメドも攻める

translation.en: Gibson's just wrapped that up in a bow and given it away.
translation.ja: ギブソンは せっかくの波を譲りました

translation.en: Gibson's not looking very comfortable out there. Hope it's not that injury troubling him.
translation.ja: 調子が悪そうです ケガの影響でしょうか

translation.en: So how long you staying?
Well according to my mum, about six weeks.
translation.ja: ママは約６週間いろって

translation.en: According to the flights I'm about to book with her credit card, 24 hours.
translation.ja: でも明日の飛行機を予約する

translation.en: But do the Gibsons know you're leaving?
translation.ja: ギブソンさんに言った？

translation.en: No, no, it's one of those secret evil plans.
translation.ja: これは秘密の計画なの

translation.en: That's pretty weird.
Poppy, it's not weird. It's like the journey she's on.
translation.ja: ポピー 方法は人それぞれよ

translation.en: Anyway, every second I stand here
translation.ja: 一刻も早く ニューヨークに帰る

translation.en: is a second I'm not in New York, so.
translation.ja: 一刻も早く ニューヨークに帰る じゃ…

translation.en: Hey, if you're only staying one night, there's a party at Poppy's place.
translation.ja: ねえ 今夜ポピーの家で パーティーがある

translation.en: Bod, she just said she wants to leave.
It'll be fun. And Ari can come to. If he wants.
translation.ja: 楽しいよ　それにアリも 来たければ来ていい

translation.en: Oh, I get it. You're using me to get to him.
translation.ja: なるほど 私を利用する気ね

translation.en: No, he's just a really good friend of ours.
translation.ja: 違うよ　アリは友達だから

translation.en: But, he's been keeping to himself lately.
translation.ja: 最近は１人でいるけどね

translation.en: Well, I'll probably be super jet lagged, but thanks for the invite.
translation.ja: 時差で眠くなると思う でも うれしい

translation.en: Got to go climb a hill.
Good luck. If the wind's right, you should get 4G.
translation.ja: 幸運を　風次第で４Ｇが入る

translation.en: Well, if I never see you guys again, have amazing lives.
translation.ja: 二度と会えなくても 人生楽しんで

translation.en: Casey takes off, upping the speed. Oh, great precision on that top turn.
translation.ja: ケーシーがテイクオフ 精度の高いトップターンです

translation.en: And oh, sticks the landing.
translation.ja: そして 着水にも成功

translation.en: Let's see what the judges have to say.
translation.ja: 審査結果はどうでしょう

translation.en: 6.8 for Casey. Puts him into second place behind Ahmed.
translation.ja: ケーシーは６.８点 アハメドに次いで２位です

translation.en: Only the top two surfers in the heat will advance to the next round
translation.ja: 次に進めるのは ヒートの上位２名のみ

translation.en: and there's barely a minute left on the clock.
translation.ja: 残り時間は わずか１分です

translation.en: Gibson with priority, but he is being very chosey out there.
translation.ja: プライオリティは ギブソンにありますが

translation.en: Looks like he might let this one go.
translation.ja: これは乗らないようです

translation.en: But no,
Gibson, the dark horse, has come to claim it after all.
translation.ja: 大穴のギブソンが ついに動きます

translation.en: Gibson's found himself the best wave of the set,
translation.ja: 最高の波に乗るギブソン

translation.en: and he really needs to nail this.
Do what you need to do?
Totally.
Oh uh Summer, this is my brother Ari.
translation.ja: サマー お兄ちゃんのアリよ

translation.en: Think you're pretty clever, don't you?
I have my moments.
Was my room.
Now your room.
Rustic.
The bed's more comfy than it looks and the sheets are new.
translation.ja: 見た目より寝心地はいい シーツも新しい

translation.en: Well not new, but you know, we washed them.
translation.ja: 新品じゃないけど洗った

translation.en: Oh, actually I was going to take that down,
but she's actually a really good surfer.
Bet she's super talented.
Definitely not. We said one competition and that is it.
translation.ja: ダメよ 大会は１度だけのはず

translation.en: I've already missed a year. If I miss another one, I'll never catch up.
translation.ja: もう１年遅れたら 追いつけない

translation.en: Half my friends are already sponsored--
The same friends who stopped coming around when you couldn't surf anymore.
translation.ja: ケガ以来 来なくなった友達？

translation.en: Summer?
What's up?
Mate, why don't we just keep free- surfing? All right, keep it simple.
translation.ja: フリーサーフィンで いいだろ？

translation.en: Comps, sponsorship, all that stuff can wait.
translation.ja: 大会や契約は延期できる

translation.en: It can't. If I want a career, it can't. This is about my future.
translation.ja: 将来のことを考えたら 延期はできない

translation.en: Your future is exactly what we're thinking about.
A whole season of competition is too much strain for your body.
translation.ja: 大会は体への負担が 大きすぎる

translation.en: What's Summer going to do, just follow you around from beach to beach?
translation.ja: サマーを連れ回すのか？

translation.en: Why not? She might be into it.
Has anyone thought that Summer might want to hang out with me instead?
translation.ja: サマーは私と遊びたいと 思うかも

translation.en: Summer. Hey, come on. Off to bed.
translation.ja: サマー ベッドで寝なさい

translation.en: - All right. - Come on. Maybe just a quick nap.
translation.ja: そうね 少し昼寝を

translation.en: We'll sleep on it.
That means no.
It means we'll sleep on it.
Sorry. I'm finished.
Yeah, no rush.
Oi!
Wait up. What are you doing?
Checking out this party, your friend Bodhi invited me.
translation.ja: パーティーよ ボディに呼ばれた

translation.en: You too actually.
Bodhi specifically said I could come?
Except she wasn't frothing at the mouth like that.
translation.ja: しかめ面じゃなかったけど

translation.en: What about my folks? Did they say we could?
I don't need permission from your parents.
But you're a good kid who does what he's told, even when his dreams are being crushed.
translation.ja: でも あなたは夢が壊れても 親に従ういい子よね

translation.en: So you should stay.
Just wait, wait.
Let me get some pants.
Oh, okay.
I can work with this.
Okay, thanks.
Because of course you have a crush on the wannabe influencer.
translation.ja: インフルエンサー志望の子に お熱か

translation.en: Oh, you barely know her.
All right, go on then. Show us your moves.
translation.ja: 続けて　どう出る気？

translation.en: Summer, you made it!
Hey, hey, yeah.
Hey Ari, sick comeback today.
translation.ja: アリ 最高の復帰だったね

translation.en: Nah, I just got lucky with that last wave and...
Yeah, so that happened.
translation.ja: そうなの　ああなった

translation.en: Hey, I have to show you something.
Your mum is Margot Torres. You didn't tell us you're from surfing royalty.
translation.ja: あのマーゴット･トーレスの 娘だなんて聞いてない

translation.en: Don't get too excited.
Anyway, is there anyone who could give me a ride to the airport tomorrow?
translation.ja: 明日 空港まで 送ってほしいの

translation.en: The airport?
Pretend you didn't hear that.
No one else from Shorehaven has ever gotten on the tour.
translation.ja: ショアヘイブン唯一の ツアー参加者

translation.en: She's kind of a legend.
And you should never meet your heroes.
Why do you need to go to the airport?
To go back to New York, dummy. So I don't have to follow you around everywhere.
translation.ja: ニューヨークに帰れば あなたに連れ回されない

translation.en: Anyway, this is a crazy boring conversation.
translation.ja: こんな話つまんないよ

translation.en: Do I need to teach you people how to party?
translation.ja: さわぎ方を教えてあげる

translation.en: Come on.
Can't stay much longer, okay? I've got finals in the morning.
translation.ja: もう帰ろう　明日は決勝だ

translation.en: I don't.
Yo. Do not try this at home.
Let me hear you! Come on, let's go!
translation.ja: もっと大声上げて　いくよ！

translation.en: Yeah, make some noise!
Come on! Let's go!
Oi!
Oh, off the balcony,
translation.ja: そこからハーフパイプに 跳んで540をキメる

translation.en: into the half pipe and then finish with a sick 540.
translation.ja: そこからハーフパイプに 跳んで540をキメる 楽勝よ

translation.en: No, it's insane.
Look, if you want to get on a plane tomorrow, whatever, but if you break your neck tonight, I'm grounded for life.
translation.ja: 今 君に死なれると 俺は一生 外出禁止になる

translation.en: And how would that be different to your current situation?
Yo! If she wants to do it man, let her do it.
translation.ja: 本人の望みだろ　やらせろよ

translation.en: Let's go!
Yo, give that back.
I will if you promise not to jump.
Right now.
Sneaking out on Summer's first night here, I can't believe you've put me in this position.
translation.ja: 滞在初日から抜け出させる なんて信じられない

translation.en: I'm sorry, you're grounded.
Mum, I'm in the quarters tomorrow, I have to be there.
You should've thought about that before you snuck out.
Summer's here all by herself, she doesn't know anyone.
translation.ja: サマーは独りぼっちなのよ 〝母さん〞

translation.en: You need to set an example.
I didn't ask her to come.
Well she's here now, so deal.
I'm going to bed.
Okay, looks like you've got it covered. Got a plane to catch.
translation.ja: もういいでしょ 私は飛行機に乗らなきゃ

translation.en: You're not seriously going through with it, are you?
Here's the thing, Ari.
I always go through with it.
What about your big finals thing? Huh?
That's what grounded usually means.
Just copy and paste my plan and sneak out.
And being a massive rebel has worked out so well for you.
At least I don't just roll over when something gets in my way.
translation.ja: 私は簡単には負けない

translation.en: At least I try.
Hey Dad?
It's a New Holland honeyeater.
translation.ja: メジロキバネミツスイよ

translation.en: Hey um, my shoulder was hurting yesterday.
translation.ja: その… 昨日 肩が痛んだ

translation.en: I just thought I'd let you know that
translation.ja: ヒートが終わったら 言おうと…

translation.en: when I finished my heat, it was hurting.
translation.ja: ヒートが終わったら 言おうと… 痛みが出た

translation.en: But then the physio said it might always hurt, and that it might just be something I have to get used to.
translation.ja: 理学療法士の話だと 慣れるしかないのかも

translation.en: I appreciate that.
And I'm sorry that your mum and I aren't as relaxed as what we used to be but...
translation.ja: 前より厳しくして すまないと思うが…

translation.en: ...you almost died a year ago, mate.
translation.ja: お前を失うところだった

translation.en: You can't expect us to just forget that and move on.
translation.ja: 簡単に忘れることはできない

translation.en: No, and I don't.
But when I was in hospital going through rehab, this is all I thought about.
translation.ja: でもリハビリを頑張れたのは サーフィンのためだ

translation.en: Getting back in the water, competing again. That's what got me through it.
translation.ja: 海に戻って また大会に出る目標があった

translation.en: Ah, well.
We did promise you one comp so,
may as well make good on it, hey?
Welcome to finals day people.
Huge day ahead, so do not leave town.
translation.ja: 町を離れないでくださいね
